resources.string: Paint Calculator is a tool to determine the amount of paint needed for painting a surface. Â© 2025 Alfaridza Hamdani.\nAll rights reserved.
Easily Calculate Paint Needs!\nEnter the surface dimensions, select the number of coats, choose the surface type, and get an accurate paint estimate to save costs!

Surface Height: %1$s m
Surface Width: %2$s m
Coats: %3$s
Surface Type: %4$s

Amount of paint needed: %5$.2f Liters

Room Width: %1$s m
Room Length: %2$s m
Room Height: %3$s m
Coats: %4s
Surface Type: %5$s

Amount of paint needed: %6$.2f Liters
